Plot: A real-time account of the events on United Flight 93, one of the planes hijacked on September eleventh, 2001, that crashed near Shanksville, Pennsylvania when passengers foiled the terrorist plot.
Title: United 93
Actors: J.J. Johnson, Gary Commock, Polly Adams, Opal Alladin
tomatoConsensus: Potent and sobering, United 93 treats the subject matter with respect, never resorting to Hollywood aggrandizement.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 27 wins & 45 nominations.
